name: Slingy Arrow - Tricky Archery Shot Challenge
name_original: Slingy Arrow - Tricky Archery Shot Challenge
description:
Slingy Arrow will test your reflexive skills in this simple yet fast paced game! Shoot the arrows onto the spinning circle while avoiding the other arrows. How good is your accuracy and reflex? Test it out now and download Slingy Arrow!

[How to Play]
•Tap on the screen to shoot
•Avoid hitting the other arrows
•Higher levels require more arrows to complete
•Beware! Circle rotation changes and different speeds when you increase levels
•Watch for updates! More levels and challenges will be updated!

Download Slingy Arrow and let's play now!

Follow us for updates and new games!
